pkgmetadata.longdescription: API Client for ENGIE's Open Wind Farm // Provides an API client to retrieve data from 'La Haute Borne', a wind farm of the ENGIE Group whose ten minutes time series have been published under the Open License 2.0 of Etalab. See https://opendata- renewables.engie.com for more information on this wind farm and data availability. The main function to be used is get_owf().
